html:
** Alphabet Inc GOOGL.O is set to be the worst performing FANG stock in 2022, according to a J.P. Morgan survey

** Amazon.com AMZN.O is investors' strong favorite as best performing FANG with ~70% of vote from respondents - survey

** JPM says 60% of respondents expect market-cap weighted internet stocks to be up more than 5%

** Investors expect the U.S. internet sector to outperform the S&P 500 index .SPX this year - survey

** "Among the names in our internet coverage that underperformed the group median in 2021, Twitter TWTR.N was selected by 16% of respondents to be the best turnaround story in 2022," adds JPM

** Bumble BMBL.O and Pinterest PINS.N are expected to be the best performing mid-cap stocks

** Snap Inc SNAP.N is expected to deliver the best performance in online ads, Uber Technologies UBER.N in rideshare/food delivery, and Booking Holdings BKNG.O in online travel, says JPM




(Reporting by Tapanjana Rudra in Bengaluru)

(( Tapanjana.Rudra@thomsonreuters.com ;))
